subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: James van Riemsdyk, the No. 2 pick in the 2007 N.H.L. draft, is thriving with the Toronto Maple Leafs, who acquired him from Philadelphia in a summer deal.
snippet: James van Riemsdyk, the No. 2 pick in the 2007 N.H.L. draft, is thriving with the Toronto Maple Leafs, who acquired him from Philadelphia in a summer deal.
